As #24635 reports, we currently don't note that a user is deactivated anywhere in the (full) user profile. Thoughts on where we should put this info?

Above the first profile field seems simplest, but maybe it could also go under the avatar or just below the name.

We have ample space between the name and the menu in the full profile. Placing a statement that says
This user has been deactivated there seems reasonable to draw enough attention.
